sentences.en: She likes to reminisce about her childhood.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢回忆她的童年时代。

sentences.en: But now was not the time to proudly reminisce - he was here on a mission of his own.
sentences.cn: 但是现在还不是进入骄傲追忆模式的时候——他还要完成自己的任务。

sentences.en: I want reminisce about my thoughts and emotions, everything that was said and done.
sentences.cn: 我想追忆我的想法和情绪，一切我所说的和所做的。
